name: RITUAL (elliotfiske)
description:
THE FOREST PROTECTS

THE FOREST PROVIDES

DO NOT STRAY FROM THE PATH, CHILD.


RITUAL is a short, narrative game about tending a mysterious forest.

Just remember the 3 rules.

Soundtrack and Sound Design by Max Linsenbard:

https://soundcloud.com/maxxorz12/sets/ludum-dare-34-ritual-ost

Uses the awesome ADVENTURER font by Brian J Smith, and the BetterPixels font by AmericanHamster.
